title: Bated
description: Marigold has horrible luck.  Now she's also got a death sentence.   Can she use her feminine wiles to get out of this one?  Marigold has committed a crime that means certain death. Now she's on the run from the shifters that want her hanged.  But Marigoldâ€™s luck turns worse when she's captured by three handsome, dragon shifter brothers. Or does it?  If you like reverse harem fantasy stories, you'll love this Goldilocks and the Three Bears retelling because it's hotter than dragon fire.  Get it now.
author: Delia Castel
